h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)
content: With his small frame, the Macaque Chief is fairly susceptible to being staggered with charged up heavy strikes. Build up your focus from light attack combos when dodging him, and then knock him down with big hits or after deflecting his moves.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snowhill_Path_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Snowhill Path Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Frost-Clad Path' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)'.
The content is as follows:
With his small frame, the Macaque Chief is fairly susceptible to being staggered with charged up heavy strikes. Build up your focus from light attack combos when dodging him, and then knock him down with big hits or after deflecting his moves.
